backend/main.mo: Defines the Ribbit canister with storage mixins, access control initialization, and extensive persistent maps for ponds, posts, ribbits, users, tags, likes, and activity tracking.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report placeholder with no listed features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files describing component behavior, layout rules, and UI constraints.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point defining root mount element and loading the main frontend script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router routes, wraps the app in ThemeProvider, and renders global toasts.
frontend/src/components/BookmarkButton.t: Bookmark toggle button that interacts with bookmark state and displays an icon with active/hover styling.
frontend/src/components/CommentItem.tsx: Renders a comment with avatar, metadata, content, and optional like and reply actions.
frontend/src/components/EmojiReactions.t: Displays selectable emoji reaction buttons with counts, hover effects, and selected state styling.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer with navigation links and attribution including a heart icon and caffeine.ai credit.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header with search UI, mobile/desktop behaviors, user avatar loading, create-menu dropdown, and search term recording.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Root layout wrapping all pages with header, footer, and mobile sidebar drawer that closes on route changes.
frontend/src/components/LeftSidebar.tsx: Navigation sidebar showing links and recent activity, with active-state detection and optional mobile drawer styling.
frontend/src/components/LilyCard.tsx: Displays a lily post with metadata, avatar, counts, like/share actions, and optional tags or user avatar.
frontend/src/components/LilyImageFrame.t: Renders images with a 4:3 frame, adding a blurred backdrop for non‑4:3 aspect ratios.
frontend/src/components/MobileLeftSideba: Mobile slide-in drawer wrapping LeftSidebar with scroll lock and scrim overlay.
frontend/src/components/PondAboutSidebar: Sidebar showing pond details, stats, moderators, and join/leave controls with loading states.
frontend/src/components/PondCardJoinCont: Join button for pond cards, handling join mutations and success/error toasts.
frontend/src/components/PondMobileHeader: Mobile pond header with banner, profile image, description, and tab navigation for feed/about.
frontend/src/components/PostCard.tsx: Card for a generic post including votes, preview content, image, tags, and metadata.
frontend/src/components/ProfileRibbitIte: Displays a user's ribbit within their profile, showing avatar, linked lily title, timestamp, content, and a link to the conversation.
Renders a popover emoji picker that calls a callback when an emoji is selected.
frontend/src/components/RibbitItem.tsx: Shows a ribbit with nesting, likes, replies, avatar loading, and reply form handling.
frontend/src/components/RibbitMiniBlurAv: Loads an avatar with a tiny blurred placeholder and smooth transition, supporting avatar or img modes.
frontend/src/components/RightSidebar.tsx: Displays trending ponds, popular tags, and recent popular lilies with loading states.
frontend/src/components/search/MobileSea: Mobile full-screen search modal showing trending searches, suggestions, and a query input.
frontend/src/components/search/SearchDro: Renders a dropdown showing trending searches or suggestions based on the query, allowing selection of a term.
frontend/src/components/TagHubRightSideb: Shows top, trending, and newest tags using shared list modules with activity counts.
frontend/src/components/UnderlineTabs.ts: Custom wrappers for TabsList and TabsTrigger adding underline-style classes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBookmarks.ts: Manages bookmarked lily IDs using localStorage with helpers to toggle, add, remove, and clear bookmarks.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebounce.ts: Provides a debounced version of a value that updates after a delay.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, stored identities, and AuthClient configuration.
frontend/src/hooks/useMediaQuery.ts: Tracks whether a given CSS media query currently matches.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend actor calls in React Query hooks for ponds, posts, and user-related operations.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styling with custom CSS variables, dark mode values, global utilities, and component-specific styles.
frontend/src/lib/formatNumber.ts: Formats large numbers into short forms like 1.2k, 1.5M, or 2B.
frontend/src/lib/imageCompression.ts: Client-side utility for validating, resizing, and compressing images, with special handling to skip animated GIF recompression.
frontend/src/lib/pondNameValidation.ts: Provides validation, normalization, and user-friendly error messages for alphanumeric pond names.
frontend/src/lib/pondRank.ts: Sorts ponds by activity metrics and assigns deterministic ranks using lily count, member count, and name.
frontend/src/lib/shareLily.ts: Shares a lily link via Web Share API or falls back to clipboard copying with toast notifications.
frontend/src/lib/tagValidation.ts: Validates and normalizes alphanumeric tags and generates optional tag error messages.
frontend/src/lib/user.ts: Manages usernames, user IDs, Froggy Phrase backup/restore, and related localStorage state.
frontend/src/lib/viewCountCooldown.ts: Implements per-lily view cooldown tracking using localStorage timestamps.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query client and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page describing Ribbit, its features, and community guidelines.
frontend/src/pages/AllPondsPage.tsx: Displays all ponds with ranks, join controls, loading skeletons, and navigation to create or view ponds.
frontend/src/pages/CreateLilyPage.tsx: Page for creating a lily with text, image, or link, including tag suggestions, pond selection, and image compression with previews.
frontend/src/pages/CreatePondPage.tsx: Page to create a new pond with validation, description fields, and compressed banner/profile image uploads with previews.
frontend/src/pages/CreatePostPage.tsx: Page for creating a post of type text, image, or link, supporting pond selection, image compression, and form validation.
frontend/src/pages/FrogProfilePage.tsx: Profile page displaying a user's avatar, stats, posts, and comments with loading and not‑found states.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Homepage showing trending or new lilies, handling search results, and rendering sidebars and loading skeletons.
frontend/src/pages/LilyPage.tsx: Displays a single lily, its replies, and metadata, with view count, likes, and ribbit creation handling.
frontend/src/pages/PondAboutPage.tsx: Shows detailed pond information including moderators, visibility, creation date, and membership controls.
frontend/src/pages/PondPage.tsx: Renders a pond’s feed with lilies filtered by pond name, join actions, and responsive layout components.
frontend/src/pages/PostPage.tsx: Displays a post with content, images, metadata, and threaded comments, allowing users to add new comments.
frontend/src/pages/SavedLiliesPage.tsx: Lists locally bookmarked lilies with loading states and removal options.
frontend/src/pages/TagHubPage.tsx: Shows top, trending, and newest tags with ranking and stats, organized in tabbed views.
frontend/src/pages/TagPage.tsx: Displays lilies for a given tag, fetching canonical tags, sorting options, and handling redirects while rendering sidebars and tag metadata.
frontend/src/pages/UserSettingsPage.tsx: Provides user settings UI including username changes, avatar upload, froggy phrase management, pond memberships, and admin tools.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS theme, colors, animations, and plugins for the frontend.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, known issues, and feature requests related to fixing pond-creation membership behavior.
